name: Path of the Shaman
description:
Combine the elements to do battle against evil elementals and reclaim the wild! You have at your disposal four base elements which can be combined into six new elements.

Credits

Kjetil Thorstensen - Producer & Artist
Simen Vegsund Dahl - Lead Programmer
Matias Lyngvær Stolen - Lead Artist & Programmer
Frans Jakob Sigurdsen - Technical Engineer & Programmer
Kine Birgitte Sletbakk - Composer & Sound Engineer
